heroTitle: Transform Your Body, Exceed Your Limits
heroTitleCarmen: Fight for your change. With biomechanics, with purpose, with confidence.
heroSubtitle: Personalized and online training with Gonorte. Achieve your fitness and wellness goals.

feature1Desc: Completely customized plans adapted to your goals, level, and lifestyle.
feature2Desc: Personalized nutritional guidance to complement your training and maximize results.
feature3Desc: Train from anywhere with live classes and high-quality recorded routines.
testimonialsSubtitle: Discover real transformations and testimonials from clients who have achieved their goals with my personalized method
testimonialsCTA: Ready for your transformation? Join these satisfied clients
gonorteTestimonial1Quote: Incredible transformation! Thanks to Gonorte and her personalized method, I lost 15kg in 6 months and feel more energetic than ever. Her approach to nutrition and functional training completely changed my life.
gonorteTestimonial2Quote: The online routines are super practical and effective. I've gained a lot of strength and endurance training from home. Gonorte is always available to adjust exercises according to my progress.
gonorteTestimonial3Quote: Nutritional counseling was key for my transformation. I learned to eat smart and it perfectly complemented my training. Now I have healthy habits that I'll maintain for life.
gonorteTestimonial4Quote: As a beginner, I was very nervous to start. Gonorte made me feel comfortable from day one. Her patience and knowledge have helped me build confidence and strength gradually.
gonorteTestimonial5Quote: After an injury, I needed specific rehabilitation. Gonorte designed a perfect program that helped me recover and come back stronger than before. Her experience is invaluable.
gonorteTestimonial6Quote: The results have been incredible. In just 3 months, I've significantly improved my athletic performance. Gonorte understands athletes' needs perfectly.
secondaryCTATitle: Ready to Take the Next Step?
secondaryCTADescription: Join thousands of innovators leveraging our platform to build the future. Don't miss out.
statsSubtitle: These numbers represent the dedication and commitment to excellence in personal training
statsCTA: Want to be part of these statistics?
profileSubtitle: Your personal trainer dedicated to transforming lives through fitness and wellness
profileDescription: I am a personal trainer passionate about fitness and wellness. With over 5 years of experience, I have helped hundreds of people achieve their health goals and transform their lives through physical exercise and balanced nutrition.
profileMission: My mission is to inspire and guide each person on their journey to a healthier life, providing personalized programs that adapt to their needs, goals, and lifestyle.
faqSubtitle: We answer the most common questions about our personal training services
faq1Answer: Personalized training adapts completely to your needs. First, we conduct an initial assessment of your physical condition, goals, and availability. Then we design a specific program that includes exercises, routines, and continuous follow-up to maximize your results.
faq2Answer: Yes! We offer complete online training with personalized routines, explanatory videos, weekly follow-up, and 24/7 support. You can train from home or wherever you want, maintaining the same quality and personalization as in-person training.
faq3Answer: Nutritional counseling includes a personalized meal plan, nutrition education, progress tracking, adjustments based on your results, and ongoing support. It's not about restrictive diets, but about creating healthy and sustainable eating habits.
faq4Question: How long does it take to see results?
faq4Answer: Results vary for each person, but you can typically notice improvements in energy and well-being from the first week. More noticeable physical changes usually appear between 4-8 weeks with consistency in training and nutrition.
faq5Answer: Absolutely! We specialize in working with people of all levels, from beginners to advanced. Each program adapts to your current level, progressing gradually to avoid injuries and maximize results.
faq6Question: What equipment do I need to train?
faq6Answer: To start, you only need your body and the desire to train. Many exercises can be done without equipment. If you have access to weights, resistance bands, or an exercise ball, we can incorporate them, but they're not necessary to begin.
faqCTASubtitle: Don't hesitate to contact me to resolve any questions about your personal training
servicesSubtitle: I offer a wide range of personalized services to help you achieve your fitness goals effectively and sustainably

aboutParagraph1: I am Carmen, founder and CEO of Gonorte Biomechanics, your personal trainer and human movement technician. Graduate in Physical Activity and Sports Sciences from the University of Granada in 2022, and holder of a Master's degree in Human Technology and Sports Medicine from the German University of Cologne in 2025, one of the most prestigious universities in Europe in technology applied to health and human movement.
aboutParagraph2:
üß≠ MISSION
Optimize human movement through science. Our mission is to help each person‚Äîfrom athletes to the general population‚Äîto move better, with less pain and greater efficiency through biomechanical technology.
aboutParagraph3:
üåç VISION
To be references in biomechanics applied to training and health at the national level. We want to lead a new way of understanding physical exercise, where movement analysis is the foundation.
aboutParagraph4:
üí° VALUES
‚Ä¢ Applied science: We are guided by updated scientific evidence, without being carried away by fitness fads and myths. We use technology for analysis and evaluation of each person's situation
‚Ä¢ Individualization: Every body is unique. That's why our plans adapt 100% to each person's needs.
‚Ä¢ Prevention: Detect before correcting. We believe in the power of analysis to prevent injuries and dysfunctions.
‚Ä¢ Education and closeness: We don't just train, we also teach. We want our clients to understand their body and learn to take care of it. We listen, accompany and support at every step.
aboutParagraph5: Graduate in Physical Activity and Sports Sciences (UGR, 2022) and Master's in Human Technology and Sports Medicine (University of Cologne, 2025). Experience in biomechanics, personal training, and injury prevention.
aboutParagraph6: We believe in science, individualization, and education as pillars to transform human movement and health.
aboutProfileSnippet: Athlete-turned-coach obsessed with helping busy humans build rituals that feel luxurious yet doable.
aboutValuesSubtitle: The principles that guide every coaching decision and client interaction
aboutValue1Desc: Every program is built around measurable progress and sustainable outcomes
aboutValue2Desc: Your life context shapes the training, not the other way around
aboutValue3Desc: Rooted in exercise science, refined through real-world application
aboutValue4Desc: Building habits that compound over years, not just weeks
aboutSignatureQuote: "Training is not punishment for what you ate; it is a daily vote for the kind of life you want."
aboutRoutine1: Deep work blocks for custom plan design
aboutTimelineSparkDescription: Moved from competitive athlete to coach, determined to blend science with empathy.
aboutTimelineExpansionDescription: Launched hybrid online coaching, building community across Europe and LATAM.
aboutTimelineInnovationDescription: Integrated wearable insights, breathwork, and mindset labs into every plan.
aboutTimelineNowDescription: Helping leaders, parents, and creators build resilient lifestyles that last.
servicesPageSubheading: Plans designed to fit your goals and budget. All include satisfaction guarantee.
planStarterDesc: Perfect to start your fitness journey
planProfessionalDesc: The most popular option for serious results
planEliteGift: üéÅ Premium fitness kit + FREE nutrition consultation

servicesFAQ2A: No, all plans are commitment-free. You can cancel whenever you want.

servicesPersonalTrainingDesc1: We offer individualized training programs, specifically designed to help you achieve your fitness goals. Whether you're looking to lose weight, gain muscle mass, improve your athletic performance, or simply adopt a more active lifestyle, we'll work with you to create a plan that fits your needs, abilities, and preferences.
servicesPersonalTrainingDesc2: Our personal training sessions include continuous monitoring, programmatic adjustments based on your progress, and the motivation needed to push your limits. Contact us for an initial consultation and discover how we can transform your body and mind.
servicesOnlineRoutinesDesc1: Access our training programs from anywhere, anytime with our online routines. Perfect for those who prefer the flexibility of training at home or while traveling, our digital routines come with detailed guides, explanatory videos, and support to ensure you perform each exercise safely and effectively.
servicesOnlineRoutinesDesc2: We offer a variety of routines adaptable to different experience levels and goals, from strength and conditioning programs to mobility and general wellness routines. All accessible through our intuitive platform.
servicesNutritionalCoachingDesc1: The perfect complement to your training. Our nutritional coaching service will teach you how to fuel your body intelligently to maximize your results and improve your overall health. It's not about restrictive diets, but about building sustainable eating habits.
servicesNutritionalCoachingDesc2: We develop personalized meal plans, educate you on the importance of macronutrients and micronutrients, and offer ongoing support so that nutrition becomes an integral and enjoyable part of your healthy lifestyle.

servicesGroupTrainingDesc1: √önete a nuestras sesiones de entrenamiento grupal donde la motivaci√≥n y el compa√±erismo se combinan para crear una experiencia de fitness excepcional. Nuestras clases est√°n dise√±adas para todos los niveles, desde principiantes hasta atletas avanzados, y ofrecen una variedad de formatos que incluyen HIIT, entrenamiento funcional, yoga y m√°s.
servicesGroupTrainingDesc2: El entrenamiento grupal no solo te ayuda a mantener la consistencia, sino que tambi√©n te conecta con una comunidad de personas que comparten tus objetivos de fitness. Nuestros instructores certificados aseguran que cada participante reciba la atenci√≥n necesaria mientras mantienen el dinamismo y la energ√≠a de la clase.
servicesRehabilitationDesc1: Nuestro programa de rehabilitaci√≥n y recuperaci√≥n est√° dise√±ado para ayudarte a recuperarte de lesiones y mejorar tu movilidad funcional. Trabajamos en estrecha colaboraci√≥n con fisioterapeutas y profesionales de la salud para crear programas personalizados que aceleren tu recuperaci√≥n y prevengan futuras lesiones.
servicesRehabilitationDesc2: Utilizamos t√©cnicas avanzadas de movilidad, ejercicios de estabilizaci√≥n y progresiones graduales para restaurar tu rango de movimiento, fuerza y confianza. Nuestro objetivo es no solo recuperarte, sino hacerte m√°s fuerte y resistente que antes de la lesi√≥n.
servicesSportsPerformanceDesc1: Especializado en mejorar el rendimiento deportivo de atletas de todos los niveles. Nuestros programas est√°n dise√±ados para optimizar la fuerza, velocidad, agilidad y resistencia espec√≠ficas de tu deporte. Utilizamos an√°lisis biomec√°nico y evaluaciones de rendimiento para crear programas que maximicen tu potencial atl√©tico.
servicesSportsPerformanceDesc2: Ya seas un atleta recreativo o competitivo, nuestro enfoque basado en la ciencia te ayudar√° a mejorar tu t√©cnica, prevenir lesiones y alcanzar nuevos niveles de rendimiento. Trabajamos con deportistas de f√∫tbol, baloncesto, tenis, atletismo y muchos otros deportes.
servicesCTADesc: Cada servicio est√° dise√±ado para adaptarse a tus necesidades espec√≠ficas. Cont√°ctanos para una consulta gratuita y descubre c√≥mo podemos ayudarte a alcanzar tus objetivos de fitness.

forWhomBullet1: You feel recurring tension or discomfort in your neck, shoulders, or back.
forWhomBullet2: You notice your posture is taking a toll (stress, loads, training, daily habits).
forWhomBullet3: You train or want to train, but need a safe foundation to progress.
forWhomBullet4: You're tired of trying random things and want an adapted, sustainable plan.
forWhomAccent: If you identify with any of these points, you're in the right place.
outcomesBullet1: Better posture and body control in your everyday life.
outcomesBullet2: Functional strength so your body stops compensating.
outcomesBullet3: Less tension and fewer setbacks with a guided process.
outcomesBullet4: Training with purpose: clarity, progression, and safety.
howStep1Desc: I'll learn about your situation, discomforts, and goals. I'll explain how I work and we'll see if it's a good fit.
howStep2Desc: We define your starting point and which exercises suit you or should be avoided right now.
howStep3Desc: I create your plan tailored to your schedule, equipment, level, goals, and needs.
howStep4Desc: We review progress, make adjustments, and work through any blockers.
howStep5Desc: Everything is explained in detail so you perform with technique and safety.
howStep6Desc: Direct contact for questions, corrections, and real ongoing support.
whatIsSubtitleStrong: It's not a template or a quick fix:
whatIsSubtitle: it's an individualised process to improve posture, reduce discomfort and build strength sustainably.
whatIsNotItem1: A template of exercises and stretches to relieve pain.
whatIsNotItem2: A quick fix for your joint pain.
whatIsItem1: An exercise programme adapted to your specific case.
whatIsItem2: An effective and lasting long-term solution for your pain.
whatIsItem3: A programme with personalised exercises and habit improvement.
presentialTitle: Want to start with maximum clarity?
presentialIntro: In addition to the online programme, there is the option of an in-person 3D postural analysis. It is a detailed assessment to understand your starting point, evaluate your posture, and leave with a personalised report and recommendations.
presentialDetail1: It is an in-person service in Ja√©n (Calle Doctor Federico del Castillo n¬∫1, CADE)
presentialDetail3: Includes a 3D technology study, posture analysis and results report, plus tailored recommendations for your individual case.
presentialNote: This service is assessed and scheduled after the initial video call, to make sure it is the right fit for you.
t5: Training with Carmen has been a before-and-after moment for me. She is always attentive, corrects every exercise and motivates you from minute one, challenging you in a way that makes you feel capable and full of energy. And the most surprising thing is that, even being remote, I never imagined an online training could be so effective. In less than three months I have achieved results I never imagined, and I know this is just the beginning. I'm so happy I found her and I have no plans to stop. She is a wonderful coach.
guideTitle: Download the guide and start with a solid foundation
guideIntro: I'll send you a practical guide by email to improve your posture, move better, and start building strength without guessing.
guideError: Something went wrong. Please try again.
guideSuccessText: Check your inbox (and spam, just in case). You'll receive the guide shortly.
guidePrivacy: I respect your privacy. Your data will not be shared with third parties.
finalCTAText: Book your initial video call and we'll find the best path for your case.
